name: Pop Smash-Toy Block Popping Mania
description:
Free Addictive PopStar Game
Fantastic fun! No Waitting ! Just try!

- Tap on two or more stars of the same color
- There is no time limit,but each stage has target scores to pass to next stage

Game Tips:
Remember just two rules:
1.The more stars you pop,the more score you will get
2.Try your best to clear all the stars,then you will get lots of bonus

Beware! Once you start pop,you can't stop!
